wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Stinson Jarvis (May 31, 1854 – January 1, 1926), generally publishing as Stinson Jarvis, was a Canadian-American writer and lawyer. Born in Toronto, he practised law in Ontario before moving to New York City and later to California to pursue a literary career. Jarvis wrote for the popular press and published several novels and other literary works. Except for his first publication, none were particularly well received.
